problem.markdown:
>>Review the data table and drill down into the district with the highest outlier weight for confirmed malaria cases. Re-apply your outlier filters. Which facility is reporting an outlier of 2139 for July 2021 for confirmed malaria cases.<<
Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)
( ) A. Facility 582 (x) B. Facility 593 ( ) C. Facility 579 ( ) D. Facility 219
[explanation] Facility 593 is correct. You will see this facility by drilling down into District D-1. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.label: Review the data table and drill down into the district with the highest outlier weight for confirmed malaria cases. Re-apply your outlier filters. Which facility is reporting an outlier of 2139 for July 2021 for confirmed malaria cases.
multiplechoiceresponse.p: Select the one correct answer: (2 attempts)

div.p: Facility 593 is correct. You will see this facility by drilling down into District D-1.
